description:
When Kikyo`s younger sister, Kaede, was still a little girl, Kikyo entrusted her with a corrupt Sacred Jewel, which was removed from the body of the Mistress centipede.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Das Liebeslied des Schicksals vor unserer ersten Begegnung – Teil 2
La canción de amor del destino antes de conocernos (2º parte)
Meguriau Mae no Sadame no Koiuta
The Tragic Love Song of Destiny, Part 2
Uma fatídica canção de amor antes de nos encontrarmos (Parte 2)
めぐり逢う前の運命恋歌[さだめのこいうた]
